title: The Organic Earth Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. The Organic Earth Bar is part of the Great Earth vitamins store. Menu includes freshly pressed juices, superfood smoothies, tonics, organic coffee, and loose leaf teas. Has a refrigerated case of ready-to-eat raw and cooked foods. Bright space with counter stools and tables for seating inside and outside. Daily specials during "powerhour" from 5-7pm. Parking on site.
